epic.name: King’s Coins
epic.type: Gain 3 HERO COINS that can be given to OTHER PLAYERS for heroic deeds

epic.name: Gemini Jewel
epic.description: That spell now casts twice when used

epic.name: Frost Bracers
epic.description: Become immune to any damage done or ill effects of cold

epic.name: Acid Whetstone
epic.description: Successful attacks with that weapon destroy 1 enemy gear

epic.name: Ring of Invisibility
epic.bonus: Make a WIS check to activate

epic.name: Crown of Goblins
epic.bonus: Command all Goblins with absolute authority

epic.name: Illusory Self
epic.bonus: Conjure a very realistic mirror-clone of yourself

epic.name: Dimension Jump
epic.bonus: Warp to any location you can see or can accurately remember

epic.name: Antlers of the Storm
epic.description: With a WIS check you can command the weather when outdoors

epic.name: Hand of Resurrection
epic.bonus: Raise 1 dead creature back to full HP

epic.name: Dire Bear
epic.bonus: Become a colossal bear for 1D4 ROUNDS

epic.name: Hoppy Gar
epic.description: All checks are EASY for 1D4 ROUNDS

epic.name: Hood of Fear
epic.description: Any enemies who can see you make a WIS check or flee on their turn

epic.name: Diamond Tiara
epic.bonus: A crown worth more than a small city

epic.name: Ivory Rose
epic.description: that person will guard you with their life

epic.name: Tooth of the Agnar
epic.description: That weapon does ULTIMATE Effort on any roll of 15+

epic.name: Magma Coil
epic.bonus: Give off a belch of smoke and fire to make any STR check EASY or STR EFFORT Ultimate

epic.name: Heroic Tabard
epic.bonus: Whenever you cry “Huzzah!” those who answer “Huzzah!” roll EASY on their next turn

epic.name: Song of the Mountain
epic.bonus: Sing! All enemies within FAR range are -5 CHA to resist persuasion

epic.name: Harpoon Gun
epic.description: Attack to grapple a foe with a +5 STR if they try to escape

epic.name: Bow of Seeking
epic.description: If you know a target’s name

epic.name: Pet Slime Cube
epic.bonus: This tiny Slime Cube has imprinted on you as parent

epic.name: Pet Goblin
epic.description: gearless runt has sworn never to leave your side

epic.name: Gravity Inversion
epic.bonus: Invert gravity within FAR range for 1D4 ROUNDS

epic.name: Brain Horror Helm
epic.description: Gain the ‘It shows you things’ property of a Brain Horror

epic.name: Gunner’s Tripod
epic.bonus: Gain +5 Attempts/Effort when firing at targets beyond FAR range with a Weapon

epic.name: Watcher
epic.description: place anywhere and see through it within 1 mile

epic.name: Dobbs’ Cheddar
epic.description: Add to any FOOD to double that FOOD’s effects

epic.name: Yalfonso’s Disc
epic.description: levitating disc of energy that holds up to 200 pounds

epic.name: Ramthas Battle Harness
epic.description: Gain 3 more slots in EQUIPPED gear

epic.name: Ronaldo’s Backwagon
epic.bonus: Gain 10 more slots in CARRIED gear

epic.name: Call of Aram
epic.description: Sound a call that can be heard for 5 miles

epic.name: Genetic Soup
epic.bonus: changes the eater into a random new BIO-FORM instantly

epic.name: Runic Rope
epic.bonus: ANY roll using this rope is EASY

epic.name: Thoor’s Stone
epic.bonus: Only the looter of this object is able to lift or move it

epic.name: Gnomish Beam Goggles
epic.description: Fires a ray of ULTIMATE Weapon damage

epic.name: Book of Infinity
epic.bonus: You have perfect recall of every fact or detail you have ever encountered

epic.name: Lemninkainen’s Wondrous Sack
epic.bonus: Increase your CARRIED gear slots to 20

epic.name: Akintu
epic.bonus: An odd tiki statue that brings good luck

epic.name: Cloud Buffalo
epic.type: A steed that descends from the sky on command

epic.name: Red Fang
epic.description: Any damage you do with Red Fang

epic.name: Gnomish Metal Melter
epic.description: then vaporizes ANY NEAR metal objects

epic.name: Juice of Sapho
epic.description: Triple the EFFORT of your next SPELL

epic.name: The Hidden
epic.bonus: Allies NEAR are invisible for 1D4 ROUNDS
epic.description: They become visible if they move away

epic.name: Boon of the Gods
epic.bonus: Grant one OTHER PLAYER a class Milestone Reward of their choice

epic.name: Roll Twice on the ANCIENT LOOT table
Shrink Ray
epic.bonus: Reduce one target to 1/100th its size for 1D4 ROUNDS

epic.name: Giant Growth
epic.bonus: Grow one target to 5x its size for 1D4 ROUNDS

epic.name: Osric’s Bulwark Wall
epic.bonus: Form a massive castle wall from boulders or cobbles

epic.name: Dragon’s Blood
epic.bonus: Grow wings and breathe fire for 1D4 ROUNDS

epic.name: Cosmic Gateway
epic.description: access ANY world in the cosmos

epic.name: Invulnerability
epic.description: they cannot be harmed for 1D8 ROUNDS

epic.name: Sherherezazahd
epic.bonus: A ghostly sword that fights at your side
epic.description: add Magical Weapon effort to all attacks

epic.name: Time Doorway
epic.bonus: Access ANY time at current location

epic.name: Stench Gar
epic.description: Reduce one NEAR creature to 1 HEART

epic.name: Lifewalker
epic.bonus: Leave a trail of flowers and growth wherever you go
epic.description: those within heal 2 HP per round

epic.name: Hammer of Hell
epic.description: All EFFORT done with this weapon affects all NEAR enemies

epic.name: Book of Mastery
epic.description: each decoded with an INT roll

epic.name: Vision of Perfection
epic.description: unless it makes a HARD CHA check

epic.name: Water of Life
epic.description: Return to life 1D4 ROUNDS later with 2 additional HEARTS

epic.name: Mead of Udin
epic.bonus: All who drink awake the next day with an additional HEART

epic.name: Shield of Angels
epic.description: You and all NEAR allies ignore any damage of 5 or less

epic.name: Necronomicon
epic.bonus: Create 1 INT SPELL or WIS POWER with a HARD INT check
